name: Two Buttons
description:
Two Buttons (Dibuzapping 2017)

Solves simple puzzles with your mouse to just pass to next screen.

Videogame made for Godot Community Game Jam (2016/2017) (https://itch.io/jam/godotjam122016) Used Godot Engine 2.1.2

For other platforms, you can compile yourself downloading the source code from here: https://github.com/jabarrera/two_buttons

This software is Open Source GPL licensed. All graphics are Creative Commons (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/)

Fonts, sounds and music have its own free license.
